title: “Category A1” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences) (New Brunswick) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (new brunswick) order 2021

title: “Category A1” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a
text_raw:
3. 

It is declared that a licence or permit permitting a person to drive a 
mechanically propelled vehicle, not being a licence or permit issued to a person 
to enable that person to learn or provisionally to drive such a vehicle, issued by 
the competent authority of the Canadian province of New Brunswick in a 
category which is the same as category A1, AM or B in the Table to Regulation 
6 of the Regulations of 2006, is recognised for the purpose of exchange of that 
licence or permit for a driving licence.
text_norm: 3 declared licence permit permitting person drive mechanically propelled vehicle licence permit issued person enable person learn provisionally drive vehicle issued competent authority canadian province new brunswick category category a1 b table regulation 6 regulation 2006 recognised purpose exchange licence permit driving licence

title: “Category A1” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: 4. (1) A driving licence for a category B vehicle being granted in exchange
text_raw:
4. (1) A driving licence for a category B vehicle being granted in exchange 
for a licence or permit referred to in Regulation 3 shall only permit the person 
whose licence or permit is exchanged to drive a category B vehicle with 
automatic transmission. 

(2) Notwithstanding paragraph (1), where the competent authority referred 
to in Regulation 3 confirms that the person exchanging the driving licence or 
permit completed a test in a vehicle with manual transmission which 
demonstrates the necessary ability to drive the category B vehicle to the 
satisfaction of the licensing authority (within the meaning of section 21 of the 
Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961)) the licence granted on exchange shall 
also permit the person to drive a category B vehicle with manual transmission. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 (3) Paragraph (2) shall not apply where, subsequent to the test referred to in 
that paragraph, the competent authority issued the person with a licence or permit 
which only permits that person to drive a category B vehicle with automatic 
transmission. 

[615] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 November, 2021. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [615]
text_norm: 4 (1) driving licence category b vehicle granted exchange licence permit referred regulation 3 shall permit person whose licence permit exchanged drive category b vehicle automatic transmission (2) notwithstanding paragraph (1) competent authority referred regulation 3 confirms person exchanging driving licence permit completed test vehicle manual transmission demonstrates necessary ability drive category b vehicle satisfaction licensing authority (within meaning section 21 road traffic act 1961 (no 24 1961)) licence granted exchange shall also permit person drive category b vehicle manual transmission notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 26th november 2021 (3) paragraph (2) shall apply subsequent test referred paragraph competent authority issued person licence permit permit person drive category b vehicle automatic transmission 615 3 given official seal 24 november 2021 eamon ryan minister transport 4 615

title: “Category A1” has the same meaning as it has in Regulation 6 of the Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order gives effect to an Agreement between Ireland and the Canadian 
Province of New Brunswick on the mutual exchange of driving licences for cars 
and certain motorcycles. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [615] 5
